name: taskbookly
author: TaskBookly LLC
description: A task management and focus tool application.

scripts.dev:electron: npm run transpile:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.dist:mac: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --universal
scripts.dist:linux: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64
scripts.dist:win: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.test:mac: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --universal --config.mac.target=dir
scripts.test:linux: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64 --config.linux.target=dir
scripts.test:win: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64 --config.win.target=dir
scripts.test-installer:mac: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --universal --publish=never
scripts.test-installer:linux: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64 --publish=never
scripts.test-installer:win: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=never
